required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase II Study for Nab-paclitaxel Plus Cisplatin vs Gemcitabine Plus Cispatin as First Line Chemotherapy in Advanced Biliary Tract Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Study for Nab-paclitaxel Plus Cisplatin vs Gemcitabine Plus Cispatin as First Line Chemotherapy in Advanced Biliary Tract Cancer

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock: It is a trial to compare the efficacy and safety of Nab-paclitaxel plus Cisplatin vs Gemcitabine plus Cispatin as first line chemotherapy in advanced biliary tract cancer.

primary_outcome.description: PFS is defined as time from the start of treatment to progression of disease or death.

secondary_outcome.description: The rate of participants that achieve either a complete response (CR) or a partial response (PR).
Overall survival is defined as time from the start of treatment until death due to any reason.
Time to progress is defined as time from randomized grouping to objective progression of tumors.

Adverse reactions refer to the occurrence and development of diseases in the process of using drugs according to normal usage and dosage to prevent, diagnose or treat diseases.Adverse reactions unrelated to the purpose of treatment.

arm_group.description: Patients in this arm receive chemotherapy with Nab-paclitaxel plus Cisplatin
Patients in this arm receive chemotherapy with Gemcitabine plus Cisplatin

intervention.description: Nab-paclitaxel 125mg/m2 IV on D1,8 plus Cisplatin 75mg/m2 IV on D1 , every 21 days.
Gemcitabine1000mg/m2 IV on D1,8 plus Cisplatin 75mg/m2 IV on D1 , every 21 days.

facility.name: Tongji Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
responsible_party.investigator_title: Professor, Head of the cancer center
